meanings.definition: To join or attach with glue.
meanings.sent1: I glued the pieces of paper together.
meanings.sent2: She always glued the broken vase back together.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally glued its paw to the table.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were glued to the screen during the entire movie.
meanings.sent5: The memories of that day are glued in my mind.

meanings.definition: To be fixed or held in place as if by glue.
meanings.sent1: The sticker was glued to the wall.
meanings.sent2: The snowflakes glued to the window in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: His feet seemed glued to the ground in fear.
meanings.sent4: The idea of winning the game glued his attention.
meanings.sent5: Her gaze was glued to the beautiful sunset.
